indicationText: Administer to persons who have partial cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia].
contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has partial cell-mediated or humoral T-lymphocyte defects [e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia].
clarifyingText: e.g., most patients with DiGeorge syndrome, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, ataxia- telangiectasia
